prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Synth Pad, Synth Lead, Guitar, Bass, Drums, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features a Synth Pad, Synth Lead, Guitar, Bass, and Drums, but no Piano.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of a Synth Pad, Synth Lead, Guitar, Bass, and Drums, omitting the Piano.

Style 3:
This song is made up of a Synth Pad, Synth Lead, Guitar, Bass, and Drums, Piano excluded.
